desc: 20% boost to Def & deters status ailments

dictionary.lore: This candlestick is believed to have been made by a cynical Summoner who was exploring an unknown world. The magical undying flame burning from its wick guarded its owner from evil, providing generations of Summoners with hope and protection with its light. Its abilities have been upgraded overtime, however, now rendering it able to guard both its owner and those surrounding him or her as well.

name: Guarding Light
